name: Dung-Beetle-Optimizer

detailed_description: Matlab and Python implementation of the Dung Beetle Optimizer (DBO), a metaheuristic optimization algorithm used for solving optimization problems in various scientific and engineering domains.

name: STEEGFormer
one_line_profile: Fair EEG BCI benchmark framework and foundation model
detailed_description: A fair EEG BCI benchmark framework accompanied by STEEGFormer, a simple yet powerful foundation model for Spatio-Temporal EEG analysis.

name: neurobench
one_line_profile: Benchmark harness for neuromorphic computing algorithms
detailed_description: A benchmark harness and baseline results for the NeuroBench algorithm track, facilitating the evaluation of neuromorphic computing models and algorithms.

name: moabb
one_line_profile: Mother of All BCI Benchmarks
detailed_description: MOABB (Mother of All BCI Benchmarks) is a comprehensive benchmarking framework for Brain-Computer Interfaces (BCI), aiming to build a large-scale benchmark of BCI algorithms on many datasets.

name: mrQA
one_line_profile: Quality assurance tools for medical imaging datasets
detailed_description: mrQA provides tools for quality assurance in medical imaging datasets, specifically checking for protocol compliance and consistency across MRI data.

name: OpenNeuro
one_line_profile: Platform for analyzing and sharing neuroimaging data
detailed_description: OpenNeuro is a free and open platform for sharing, archiving, and analyzing neuroimaging data, supporting BIDS standard datasets.

name: CuBIDS
one_line_profile: Software for curation and processing of BIDS datasets
detailed_description: CuBIDS (Curation of BIDS) is a software package designed to help users curate and process BIDS (Brain Imaging Data Structure) datasets, ensuring data integrity and facilitating preprocessing.

name: StitchIt
one_line_profile: Tool for stitching large tiled microscopy datasets
detailed_description: StitchIt is a tool designed for the stitching of large tiled datasets, commonly used in advanced microscopy to reconstruct large field-of-view images.

name: MEArec
one_line_profile: Simulator for extracellular recordings on MEA
detailed_description: MEArec is a fast and customizable simulator for extracellular recordings on Micro-Electrode Arrays (MEA), enabling the generation of synthetic ground-truth data for spike sorting validation.

name: SpikeForest
one_line_profile: Benchmarking system for spike sorting algorithms
detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmarking system designed to evaluate the performance of various spike sorting algorithms against ground-truth datasets, providing a standardized framework for algorithm comparison.

name: SpikeForest2
one_line_profile: Version 2 of the SpikeForest spike sorting benchmarking analysis system
detailed_description: The second version of the SpikeForest system, providing updated analysis tools and web-based visualization components for benchmarking spike sorting algorithms.

name: coconatfly
one_line_profile: Comparative connectomics tool for Drosophila datasets
detailed_description: Part of the natverse ecosystem, this R package facilitates the comparative analysis of connectomics data across public and in-progress Drosophila datasets, enabling retrieval and comparison of neuronal connectivity.

name: photon-mosaic
one_line_profile: Automated analysis pipeline for multiphoton imaging
detailed_description: A Python tool designed for the automated and reproducible analysis of multiphoton imaging datasets, facilitating the processing of large-scale calcium imaging or structural imaging data.

name: multipy
one_line_profile: Multiple hypothesis testing library for Python
detailed_description: A Python library implementing various methods for controlling the family-wise error rate (FWER) and false discovery rate (FDR) in multiple hypothesis testing, commonly used in neuroimaging and statistical analysis.

name: psychopy_ext
one_line_profile: Framework for reproducible behavioral neuroscience experiments
detailed_description: An extension framework for PsychoPy designed to facilitate rapid, reproducible design, analysis, and plotting of experiments in behavioral neuroscience and psychology.

name: eyeris
one_line_profile: Reproducible pupillometry preprocessing and analysis
detailed_description: A CRAN-published R package providing tools for BIDS-compliant preprocessing, automated quality control, and analysis of pupillometry data.

name: TorchEEG
one_line_profile: PyTorch-based library for EEG signal analysis
detailed_description: A comprehensive library built on PyTorch for EEG signal analysis, providing datasets, transforms, and deep learning models specifically designed for electroencephalography tasks.

name: TtoZ
one_line_profile: Convert T-score brain maps to Z-score maps
detailed_description: A utility tool to convert neuroimaging statistical maps from T-scores to Z-scores, facilitating standardization and comparison of brain activation maps.
